TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataListDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner

summary.span: 擴充 Web 伺服器控制項的設計階段行為。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. 程式碼會覆寫方法，以顯示五個點框線也就是紫色如果啟用控制項。The code overrides the method to display a five-point border that is purple if the control is enabled. param.span: 可用於建立樣板 (Template) 編輯框架 (Frame)。

An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是使用編輯框架，使用範本群組和設計工具編輯區域。Rather than using editing frames, use template groups and designer editing regions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 與 。For more information, see and .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: ，表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，，則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; to release only the unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`disposing`是`true`、方法 managed 物件所掌握的資源全部釋出這個物件參考。When `disposing` is `true`, the method releases all resources held by the managed objects that this object references.

para.span: 方法可以由其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: The method can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫它，確保不會參考物件已處置之前呼叫。

span.span: When overriding it, ensure that you do not reference objects that have been disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和方法，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about the and methods, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String
public: override System::String ^ GetDesignTimeHtml();

summary.span: 取得 HTML，用於在設計階段表示 控制項。

span.span: Gets the HTML used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: HTML，用於在設計階段表示 控制項。

span.span: The HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following code example shows how to override the method. 變更控制項的設計介面則控制項的外觀屬性是`true`。It alters the appearance of the control on the design surface if the control's property is `true`. 程式碼會使用`Try...Catch...Finally`語法來執行下列動作：The code uses `Try...Catch...Finally` syntax to do the following: - `Try`區段會變更控制項的屬性值。The `Try` section changes the values of the properties of the control. - `Catch`區段攔截任何例外狀況，並傳送至方法。The `Catch` section catches any exceptions and sends them to the method. - `Finally` > 一節將屬性設定為其原始值。The `Finally` section sets the properties to their original values. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/CS/SimpleGridView.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/VB/SimpleGridView.vb#2)]
